mapper.select: SELECT r.review_no AS reviewNo, r.review_title AS reviewTitle, r.review_content AS reviewContent, p.program_name AS programName, pm.customer_id AS customerId, r.createdate FROM review r INNER JOIN program_reservation pr ON r.program_reservation_no = pr.program_reservation_no INNER JOIN payment pm ON pr.payment_no = pm.payment_no INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program p ON pd.program_no = p.program_no
SELECT review_no reviewNo, review_reply_content reviewReplyContent, employee_id employeeId, createdate FROM review_reply
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (program_reservation_no, review_title, review_content, createdate, updatedate )VALUES( #{programReservationNo}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.program_name programName, b.branch_name branchName, pd.program_date programDate FROM program_reservation pr INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program p ON pd.program_no = p.program_no INNER JOIN branch b ON pr.branch_no = b.branch_no WHERE pr.program_reservation_no = #{programReservationNo}
